episode_summary: This episode of Keeping It Real announces a live webinar featuring top industry experts like Greg Pekarski and Kim Rettberg. It covers lead generation strategies, video marketing techniques, and agent coaching methods to help real estate professionals excel in 2025. Listeners are encouraged to sign up for the webinar to gain actionable insights and interact with the experts.
